originalText.text: Content of afternoon tea was good but the experience was not worth the price of 145$ per person. There's nothing special or spectacular to warrant such a high price. The place itself is quite small. Couldn't finish the pastries anyways and brought them home. Come and have a drink instead.

text.text: Content of afternoon tea was good but the experience was not worth the price of 145$ per person. There's nothing special or spectacular to warrant such a high price. The place itself is quite small. Couldn't finish the pastries anyways and brought them home. Come and have a drink instead.

originalText.text: Dined for morning breakfast - nice service and beautiful restaurant! I ordered the tofu scramble dish. It was good but I have honestly had better in other places, prices are steep too. However, the person I was dining with got the gluten free chocolate chip pancakes; it was very nice because for gluten free dishes, the chef will bring it out personally and the person I was dining with told me they were very good! Prices are expensive here.

text.text: Dined for morning breakfast - nice service and beautiful restaurant! I ordered the tofu scramble dish. It was good but I have honestly had better in other places, prices are steep too. However, the person I was dining with got the gluten free chocolate chip pancakes; it was very nice because for gluten free dishes, the chef will bring it out personally and the person I was dining with told me they were very good! Prices are expensive here.

originalText.text: Came here for a brunch during the weekend. I ordered egg Benedict and a champagne. The food is not really impressive but the ambience is kinda nice. The service was great and the staff was very friendly.

text.text: Came here for a brunch during the weekend. I ordered egg Benedict and a champagne. The food is not really impressive but the ambience is kinda nice. The service was great and the staff was very friendly.

originalText.text: The food is terrible. Processed mass produced ingredients. I could get a better sandwich at the deli. I would accept the outrageous price if the food was quality, but this beneath public school breakfast quality. Shame on this place for conducting itself the way it does. I had to return two dishes. Shame on this place times 100. They need to get rid of the manager and everyone in the kitchen and start from scratch. A yogurt coffee and French toast was 144 dollars.  DO NOT FALL FOR THIS FACTORY TRASH. I WILL PRAY FOR THIS PLACE

originalText.text:
A Festive Escape into Elegance at Astor Court

Astor Court at the St. Regis provided a delightful backdrop for our 'tis-the-season' outing, enchanting us with its beautifully adorned interiors that perfectly captured the spirit of Christmas.

Stepping into the St. Regis during the holiday season was like walking into a winter wonderland. The hotel's decorations were a visual treat, with Astor Court standing out as a highlight. The restaurant, with its innate elegance and charm, was a sight to behold, offering a warm and inviting ambiance that felt both luxurious and cozy.

While the hotel itself could benefit from a bit of rejuvenation, the overall experience was nothing short of lovely. My only wish was for a touch more Christmas spirit in the menu ‚Äì perhaps some festive-themed dishes or a special treat for guests, like Christmas cookies, to fully embrace the holiday cheer.

Our dining experience was made even more memorable by the exceptional service we received from Mohammed, our server. His attentive, accommodating, and genuinely warm demeanor ensured we felt special and well cared for throughout our meal. It's the kind of service that makes a meal not just a culinary experience but a cherished memory.

In summary, Astor Court at the St. Regis is a wonderful choice for those seeking an elegant dining experience, especially during the holiday season. With its beautiful setting and top-notch service, it's a place where the magic of the season comes to life, even if just a dash more holiday flair in the menu would make it perfect. üéÑüçΩÔ∏è‚ú®
